name: Artificial Creativity
description:
Artificial Creativity is a story driven puzzle platformer about an artificial intelligence and its creator.

Full of varied puzzles that will force you to think outside the box and make use of various game mechanics.

Unusual environments and surreal moments to keep you at the edge of your seat.

Will you be able to piece together the story and make the right choice?


Controls :

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Jump

Mouse - Interact with various objects


Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/GeorgeBGameDesign/
